item.title: goldcomparts.show
item.description: This is the website I made for my final degree show, “So, How is That Working For You?” (5-8 Sept 2019). Map implemented by Julia Makivic. Built using Hugo, the static site generator, HTML/CSS3 and JavaScript (no libraries). Makes use of a monospace font and the “ch” unit in CSS to perfectly align the ASCII art design to the grid. Visit goldcomparts.show
